NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PLUME: Friends, I shall be departing Twin with Phlox soon ahead of your expedition. Might you have any suggestions on how we might protect ourselves from the terrible heat on Ember Twin? 2 1 MELORAE: Oh, Plume! Young Oeno has engineered a new version of our spacesuits to shelter us from intense heat - you must don them before you depart! 3 2 MELORAE: The expedition team to the forested planet discovered new natural resources native to the planet which appear to have fantastically heat-resistant properties. 4 3 MELORAE: Oeno was able to integrate these new materials into our spacesuits, greatly improving their durability and insulative properties. 5 3 MELORAE: In other words, this new suit should make the heat from the sun far more bearable during your visit to Ember Twin! 6 5 COLEUS: Imagine if we had such wondrous equipment when we were constructing and calibrating that device, Melorae! 7 6 MELORAE: Then I imagine we might begin to miss the sun on this stormy, sunless planet... Which I must say, I absolutely have not! 8 7 PLUME: You have my gratitude, my friends. And I can only compliment your tenacity, working in such conditions without this protection!
